title: Social Media
description:
Job description

Summary

We are seeking a full time Social Media Virtual Assistant with previous experience in managing online interactions and responding to social media inquiries. You'll be the main point of contact for our prospective customers, ensuring all comments and direct messages are addressed promptly and efficiently on all our social media channels including Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn etc.

  • Location: Remote
  • Job Type: Full-time (40 Hours per week)

What you will be doing

Oversee direct messages and comments across Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and LinkedIn, ensuring every interaction gets a timely and apt response.

Channel potential customers to the right sales rep depending on the response, ensuring a seamless transition from inquiry to engagement.

Use our established response templates while also weaving in your personal touch, guaranteeing every response feels both professional and personal.

Work in tandem with our sales and marketing teams, ensuring leads and feedback are appropriately handled.

As the social media landscape evolves, so do inquiries. Bring new situations to the table and collaborate on crafting the best response strategies.

Occasionally, you will be responsible for posting content made by the creative team on the various social media platforms.

What you bring to the table

  • 2+ years of hands-on experience in social media community management.
  • Stellar written communication skills in English.
  • An intuitive understanding of diverse social media platforms and user behavior.
  • Familiarity with CRM tools is a bonus.
  • A proactive mindset paired with the ability to work autonomously.
  • Problem-solving skills, especially in high-pressure, real-time scenarios.
  • Familiarity with the latest digital technologies and social media trends.

Work Dynamics:

This is a full-time role, aligned with PST hours. You'll be part of a vibrant team, yet also be trusted with a high degree of independence. Regular sync-ups with the co-founder will ensure you're always aligned with our brand's evolving vision.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $100.00 - $170.00 per hour

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $100.00 - $170.00 per hour

Application Question(s):

  • Do you have the ability to work as an independent contractor?
  • How many years of social media community management experience do you have: 2 years (Required)

Education:

  • Bachelor's (Preferred)

Language:

  • fluent English (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: SDET/Automation Engineer (Selenium and Java needed)
description:
Position's General Duties and Tasks:

  • Works closely with customers, business analysts, and team members to understand business requirements that drive the analysis, design and quality of technical solutions.
  • Creates, modify and maintain functional and non-functional requirements for system enhancements, upgrades and new functionality, ensures quality implementation. (Non-functional requirements are system requirements related to the hardware/software environment in which the application will operate, but are not part of the actual business function(s) performed by the application)..

Must have Skills:

  • Bilingual English Spanish
  • 5+ years of end-to-end testing experience including: requirements analysis, test case design and development, testing execution, maintenance and Test automation.
  • 4+ years of Experience on NodeJS, Cypress, TypeScript
  • Automation tools – Selenium.
  • 4+ years experience with Java.
  • Experience with SQL queries to review and update test data

Education Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree (completely finished)

Job Type: Full-time

Application Question(s):

  • Do you have an ADVANCED English level?
  • How many years of experience do you have with end-to-end testing?
  • How many years do you have using Selenium with Java?
  • Do you have your bachelor's degree?

Work Location: Remote

title: Ejecutivo en monitoreo logístico (Nocturno)
description:
Sumarse a work one solutions significa que te estás uniendo a la compañía de Logística más innovadora de México. En nuestra compañía, tenemos un ambiente humano: Solutioners apasionados e impulsados a mover el mundo.

Algunas de las actividades que realizarás:

  • Enviar reportes con los movimientos programados a todos los clientes.
  • Asegurar la localización y estado de las unidades de manera continua.
  • Identificar y corregir anormalidades en el avance de las unidades.
  • Notificar en tiempo cualquier demora de la unidad.
  • Comunicarse con proveedores, carriers, clientes, ejecutivos aduanales, etc. Para obtener y/o proveer información respecto al proceso logístico.
  • Llevar registro de las unidades en tránsito, así como de tiempos, ubicaciones, datos de cruce, etc.
  • Seguimiento desde recolección hasta entrega y recopilación documental.

Competencias que requerirás para ejecutar tus actividades:

  • Atención, servicio al cliente.
  • Solución de problemas.
  • Análisis oportuno.
  • Sentido de urgencia
  • Razonamiento lógico
  • Capacidad de trabajo en equipo.
  • Toma de decisiones.

Actitudes que te darán un plus

  • Amabilidad
  • Servicial
  • Proactividad

¿Qué te ofrecemos para que tengas una experiencia laboral única?

  • Uniformes gratuitos
  • 5% del salario en vales de despensa
  • Días de descanso superiores a la Ley
  • Flexibilidad laboral
  • Capacitación y desarrollo
  • Plan de carrera (Al ser una empresa nueva tus posibilidades de crecimiento son altas, siempre y cuando se demuestre un desempeño extraordinario)
  • Estacionamiento gratuito

Puntos indispensables para aplicar:

  • Contar con una carrera en logística, comercio exterior, negocios Internacionales o afín.
  • Inglés conversacional
  • Disponibilidad para trabajar en horario nocturno

Tipo de puesto: Tiempo completo

Salario: $3,000.00 - $3,100.00 a la semana

Horario:

  • Lunes a viernes

Lugar de trabajo: Empleo remoto

title: servicio al cliente
description:
Somos una STARTUP B2B mexicana en Fast growing Scaling-Up! formamos parte del batch YC S22, estamos levantado capital de inversión y acelerando nuestra expansión de equipo y portafolio de soluciones, ya estamos operando en más de cinco ciudades de México.

Pide directo nace con la meta de ser el mejor aliado de los establecimientos locales, que buscan ser la mejor opción para sus consumidores. Logramos que los negocios vendan directamente a sus clientes sin intermediarios, con precios directos y sin comisión. Brindándoles ese servicio a domicilio único, rápido y seguro para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Habilitamos su web app de pedidos online en tan solo 5 minutos. Pide Directo es la primera plataforma de envíos a domicilio sin comisiones.

Estamos en búsqueda de un experto en “Custumer Service” , tu contribución es expandir nuestro servicio a nuestros socios comerciales, construyendo una red de afiliados solida.

  • EXPERIENCIA COMPROBABLE EN SERVICIO AL CLIENTE MINIMO 2 AÑOS, TELEFÓNICO, SOLUCION DE PROBLEMAS, ACLARACIONES, ETC, TODO VÍA REMOTA(WHATS APP)
  • EXCELENTE MANEJO DE PC (AGILIDAD EN CAPTURA DE INFORMACION)

OFRECEMOS:

  • HOME OFFICE 60%

  • VACACIONES 12 DÍAS AL PRIMER AÑO
  • HORARIOS ROTATIVOS.
  • DESCANSO 1 DIA LA SEMANA

  • CRECIMIENTO A CORTO PLAZO
  • HERRAMIENTA DE TRABAJO (LAP)
  • BONO DE $1,500 POR METRICAS
  • PRESTACIONES DE LEY

HABILIDADES:

  • ATENCION AL CLIENTE
  • ALEGRIA
  • EMPATISMO
  • ACTITUD DE SERVICIO

  • Incluye fines de semana
  • Rotativo
  • Turno de 8 horas

title: Coordinador de Desarrollo de Negocios
description:
Estamos buscando un Coordinador de Desarrollo de Negocios de habla hispana para América Latina.
Nuestra empresa tiene su sede en los EE. UU. y busca expandir nuestro negocio en países de América Latina.

Descripción del trabajo:

1. Investigar y comprender el marco regulatorio de cada país.

2. Preparar y presentar solicitudes y expedientes a las agencias reguladoras correspondientes.

3. Comunicarse con los departamentos reguladores.

4. Investigar el proceso de registro de productos de suplementos dietéticos, alimentos y complementos alimenticios en cada país.

5. Ayudar con las traducciones y la documentación al español.

6. Apoyar a los equipos de marketing digital y comercio electrónico con el desarrollo de contenido y campañas publicitarias en español.

7. Manejar la comunicación de front-end con cuentas clave en los respectivos países.

8. Desarrollar y mantener relaciones profesionales con agencias reguladoras federales, estatales y locales.

9. Realizar otras funciones relacionadas que le sean asignadas.

Tipo de trabajo: medio tiempo (remoto/trabajo desde casa)

Horario: 4 horas al día

Tipo de puesto: Medio tiempo
Horas de medio tiempo: 20 por semana

Sueldo: $50.00 - $100.00 la hora

Horario:

  • Diurno
  • Lunes a viernes

Prestaciones:

  • Horarios flexibles
  • Trabajo desde casa

Lugar de trabajo: Empleo remoto

● Identificar, mapear datos y especificaciones técnicas para integrarlos a otros sistemas (análisis de SAP, APIs, Sitios WEB)

  • Requisito indispensable nivel de inglés alto

title: Applicants Staffing Analyst (Remote)
description:
⭐️ A Typical Day

A Applicants Staffing Analyst is responsible for creating resumes that highlight the skills, experience, and accomplishments of our Candidates.

Responsibilities for this position include, but are not limited to:

● Manage and review our candidate pipeline and keep track of each candidate's status in our ATS

● Explain employment conditions and modalities in different countries

● Negotiate offers packages

● Keep candidates updated on the status of their process

● Assist in the preparation of candidate’s documents and resumes

● Update, maintain and organize candidates’ records.

● Participate in the client interview coordination process

● This role also requires you to be flexible and undertake duties outside of this role

Qualifications

  • Fluency in English (near-native)
  • Exceptional written and verbal communication skills
  • Time management skills and ability to prioritize
  • Technology savvy with an interest in new generation technology—comfortable doing things a different way, trouble-shooting and recommending new technology
  • Availability to work Full Time Remotely (Mon-Fri/ 9AM-6PM)

title: Freelance Senior Video Designer
description:
We are seeking a talented Senior Video Designer to lead video projects for our growing agency, from conceptualization to execution. This role requires a blend of creativity, technical expertise, and a passion for visual storytelling. The ideal candidate will have a strong ability to translate ideas into compelling visual narratives that captivate and engage audiences.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Conceptual Design: Develop creative concepts for video projects based on project briefs, ensuring alignment with brand guidelines and project objectives.
  • Team Collaboration: Work closely with internal team members to create cohesive and compelling video content.
  • Technical Expertise: Stay updated with the latest video production tools, techniques, and trends, ensuring high-quality production standards.
  • Project Management: Coordinate timelines and resources for video projects, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality outputs.
  • Feedback and Revisions: Implement feedback from stakeholders and make revisions as required, ensuring all videos meet the intended objectives and quality standards.

Qualifications:

  • At least 2-3 years of video design experience, with a strong portfolio showcasing a range of video projects, including social media ad experience.
  • Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Final Cut Pro, and other industry-standard tools.
  • Strong understanding of storytelling, pacing, and visual design as they relate to video.
  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate and justify design decisions.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects concurrently, ensuring all are completed on time and on brief.

Job Types: Part-time, Contract
Contract length: 12 months
Part-time hours: 15 per week

Pay: $100.00 - $250.00 per hour

Application Question(s):

  • What tools do you use for design? Which are you most comfortable using?
  • Can you share a link to your portfolio?
  • Tell me about your design experience creating social media advertisements.
  • Do you have any marketing or design agency experience?
  • This is a contract position. What hourly rate or monthly salary are you looking for?

Experience:

  • Social Video Ad: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote

Expected Start Date: 21/08/2023

title: Force.com Developer
description:
Somos una STARTUP B2B mexicana en Fast growing Scaling-Up! formamos parte del batch YC S22, estamos levantado capital de inversión y acelerando nuestra expansión de equipo y portafolio de soluciones, ya estamos operando en más de cinco ciudades de México.

Pide directo nace con la meta de ser el mejor aliado de los establecimientos locales, que buscan ser la mejor opción para sus consumidores. Logramos que los negocios vendan directamente a sus clientes sin intermediarios, con precios directos y sin comisión. Brindándoles ese servicio a domicilio único, rápido y seguro para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Habilitamos su web app de pedidos online en tan solo 5 minutos. Pide Directo es la primera plataforma de envíos a domicilio sin comisiones.

Estamos en búsqueda de un experto en “Custumer Service” , tu contribución es expandir nuestro servicio a nuestros socios comerciales, construyendo una red de afiliados solida.

title: Desarrollador Netsuite
description:
Estamos buscando un Coordinador de Desarrollo de Negocios de habla hispana para América Latina.
Nuestra empresa tiene su sede en los EE. UU. y busca expandir nuestro negocio en países de América Latina.

Descripción del trabajo:

1. Investigar y comprender el marco regulatorio de cada país.

2. Preparar y presentar solicitudes y expedientes a las agencias reguladoras correspondientes.

3. Comunicarse con los departamentos reguladores.

4. Investigar el proceso de registro de productos de suplementos dietéticos, alimentos y complementos alimenticios en cada país.

5. Ayudar con las traducciones y la documentación al español.

6. Apoyar a los equipos de marketing digital y comercio electrónico con el desarrollo de contenido y campañas publicitarias en español.

7. Manejar la comunicación de front-end con cuentas clave en los respectivos países.

8. Desarrollar y mantener relaciones profesionales con agencias reguladoras federales, estatales y locales.

9. Realizar otras funciones relacionadas que le sean asignadas.

Tipo de trabajo: medio tiempo (remoto/trabajo desde casa)

title: VACANTE DE PRÁCTICAS PROFESIONALES CIENCIAS DE LA COMUNICACIÓN
description:
We are seeking a talented Senior Video Designer to lead video projects for our growing agency, from conceptualization to execution. This role requires a blend of creativity, technical expertise, and a passion for visual storytelling. The ideal candidate will have a strong ability to translate ideas into compelling visual narratives that captivate and engage audiences.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Conceptual Design: Develop creative concepts for video projects based on project briefs, ensuring alignment with brand guidelines and project objectives.
  • Team Collaboration: Work closely with internal team members to create cohesive and compelling video content.
  • Technical Expertise: Stay updated with the latest video production tools, techniques, and trends, ensuring high-quality production standards.
  • Project Management: Coordinate timelines and resources for video projects, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality outputs.
  • Feedback and Revisions: Implement feedback from stakeholders and make revisions as required, ensuring all videos meet the intended objectives and quality standards.

Qualifications:

  • At least 2-3 years of video design experience, with a strong portfolio showcasing a range of video projects, including social media ad experience.
  • Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Final Cut Pro, and other industry-standard tools.
  • Strong understanding of storytelling, pacing, and visual design as they relate to video.
  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate and justify design decisions.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects concurrently, ensuring all are completed on time and on brief.

Job Types: Part-time, Contract
Contract length: 12 months
Part-time hours: 15 per week

Pay: $100.00 - $250.00 per hour

Application Question(s):

  • What tools do you use for design? Which are you most comfortable using?
  • Can you share a link to your portfolio?
  • Tell me about your design experience creating social media advertisements.
  • Do you have any marketing or design agency experience?
  • This is a contract position. What hourly rate or monthly salary are you looking for?

Experience:

  • Social Video Ad: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote

Expected Start Date: 21/08/2023

title: LEGAL DEMAND WRITER
description:
Job description

Summary

We are seeking a full time Social Media Virtual Assistant with previous experience in managing online interactions and responding to social media inquiries. You'll be the main point of contact for our prospective customers, ensuring all comments and direct messages are addressed promptly and efficiently on all our social media channels including Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn etc.

  • Location: Remote
  • Job Type: Full-time (40 Hours per week)

What you will be doing

Oversee direct messages and comments across Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and LinkedIn, ensuring every interaction gets a timely and apt response.

Channel potential customers to the right sales rep depending on the response, ensuring a seamless transition from inquiry to engagement.

Use our established response templates while also weaving in your personal touch, guaranteeing every response feels both professional and personal.

Work in tandem with our sales and marketing teams, ensuring leads and feedback are appropriately handled.

As the social media landscape evolves, so do inquiries. Bring new situations to the table and collaborate on crafting the best response strategies.

Occasionally, you will be responsible for posting content made by the creative team on the various social media platforms.

What you bring to the table

  • 2+ years of hands-on experience in social media community management.
  • Stellar written communication skills in English.
  • An intuitive understanding of diverse social media platforms and user behavior.
  • Familiarity with CRM tools is a bonus.
  • A proactive mindset paired with the ability to work autonomously.
  • Problem-solving skills, especially in high-pressure, real-time scenarios.
  • Familiarity with the latest digital technologies and social media trends.

Work Dynamics:

This is a full-time role, aligned with PST hours. You'll be part of a vibrant team, yet also be trusted with a high degree of independence. Regular sync-ups with the co-founder will ensure you're always aligned with our brand's evolving vision.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $100.00 - $170.00 per hour

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $100.00 - $170.00 per hour

Application Question(s):

  • Do you have the ability to work as an independent contractor?
  • How many years of social media community management experience do you have: 2 years (Required)

Education:

  • Bachelor's (Preferred)

Language:

  • fluent English (Required)

Work Location: Remote

(Non-functional requirements are system requirements related to the hardware/software environment in which the application will operate, but are not part of the actual business function(s) performed by the application)..

Somos una STARTUP B2B mexicana en Fast growing Scaling-Up! formamos parte del batch YC S22, estamos levantado capital de inversión y acelerando nuestra expansión de equipo y portafolio de soluciones, ya estamos operando en más de cinco ciudades de México.

Pide directo nace con la meta de ser el mejor aliado de los establecimientos locales, que buscan ser la mejor opción para sus consumidores. Logramos que los negocios vendan directamente a sus clientes sin intermediarios, con precios directos y sin comisión. Brindándoles ese servicio a domicilio único, rápido y seguro para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Habilitamos su web app de pedidos online en tan solo 5 minutos. Pide Directo es la primera plataforma de envíos a domicilio sin comisiones.

title: Manual QA Tester
description:
Estamos buscando un Coordinador de Desarrollo de Negocios de habla hispana para América Latina.
Nuestra empresa tiene su sede en los EE. UU. y busca expandir nuestro negocio en países de América Latina.

Descripción del trabajo:

1. Investigar y comprender el marco regulatorio de cada país.

2. Preparar y presentar solicitudes y expedientes a las agencias reguladoras correspondientes.

3. Comunicarse con los departamentos reguladores.

4. Investigar el proceso de registro de productos de suplementos dietéticos, alimentos y complementos alimenticios en cada país.

5. Ayudar con las traducciones y la documentación al español.

6. Apoyar a los equipos de marketing digital y comercio electrónico con el desarrollo de contenido y campañas publicitarias en español.

7. Manejar la comunicación de front-end con cuentas clave en los respectivos países.

8. Desarrollar y mantener relaciones profesionales con agencias reguladoras federales, estatales y locales.

9. Realizar otras funciones relacionadas que le sean asignadas.

Tipo de trabajo: medio tiempo (remoto/trabajo desde casa)

Horario: 4 horas al día

title: Program Manager
description:
We are seeking a talented Senior Video Designer to lead video projects for our growing agency, from conceptualization to execution. This role requires a blend of creativity, technical expertise, and a passion for visual storytelling. The ideal candidate will have a strong ability to translate ideas into compelling visual narratives that captivate and engage audiences.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Conceptual Design: Develop creative concepts for video projects based on project briefs, ensuring alignment with brand guidelines and project objectives.
  • Team Collaboration: Work closely with internal team members to create cohesive and compelling video content.
  • Technical Expertise: Stay updated with the latest video production tools, techniques, and trends, ensuring high-quality production standards.
  • Project Management: Coordinate timelines and resources for video projects, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality outputs.
  • Feedback and Revisions: Implement feedback from stakeholders and make revisions as required, ensuring all videos meet the intended objectives and quality standards.

Qualifications:

  • At least 2-3 years of video design experience, with a strong portfolio showcasing a range of video projects, including social media ad experience.
  • Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Final Cut Pro, and other industry-standard tools.
  • Strong understanding of storytelling, pacing, and visual design as they relate to video.
  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate and justify design decisions.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects concurrently, ensuring all are completed on time and on brief.

Job Types: Part-time, Contract
Contract length: 12 months
Part-time hours: 15 per week

Pay: $100.00 - $250.00 per hour

Application Question(s):

  • What tools do you use for design? Which are you most comfortable using?
  • Can you share a link to your portfolio?
  • Tell me about your design experience creating social media advertisements.
  • Do you have any marketing or design agency experience?
  • This is a contract position. What hourly rate or monthly salary are you looking for?

Experience:

  • Social Video Ad: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote

Expected Start Date: 21/08/2023

  • Fuerte conocimiento de las reglas de emisión de boletos de aerolíneas, estructuras de tarifas y regulaciones de la industria.
  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicación y organización.
  • Capacidad para trabajar eficazmente bajo presión y manejar múltiples tareas de manera eficiente.
  • Debe ser automotivado, orientado a los detalles y poseer un fuerte sentido de responsabilidad.
